relationships.description: Slughorn is the head of Slytherin house.
Harry Potter is a student in Gryffindor house.
Sirius Black was attended by Slughorn when he was at Hogwarts.
Regulus Black was also attended by Slughorn when he was at Hogwarts.
Sirius Black was a student in Gryffindor house.
